overview:
Harris Larney is Visiware Inc.â€™s General Manager of North America.

Harris actively works with television networks, production companies, cable and satellite operators, and with major brands focused on advertising and promotions on the second screen. Harris is an industry expert in digital content and second screen devices. His prior experience includes an executive management role at a $100M digital content company and working with leading Fortune 50 technology company, Motorola, where he developed and launched new mobile media and content solutions worldwide.
